alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Garfield; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 22 at 2:25PM MDT until April 24 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 8 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Garfield, Daniels, Western Roosevelt and Central and Southern Valley Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Bridges and overpasses will be the first locations for ice to form on roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Boating on Fort Peck Lake will be hazardous. Strong winds and large waves could potentially swamp your watercraft.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Garfield; Western Roosevelt
